TaskDescription: A multi-source interference task- a probe of cognitive control.
Instructions: Next is the number task. When the scan starts, a white dot will appear on the screen for 30 seconds before the task begins. Once the task starts, please remember to report the value of the number that does not belong in the set. The sets of numbers will change about every two seconds. Please answer as quickly as possible, but since getting the correct answer is important, do not sacrifice accuracy for speed. This scan will last about 7 minutes.
